body:
This appears to be an incomplete override of builtin.sqlite by hsf.sqlite. The hsf.sqlite package does not have a patch. I appears to pick up newer version from hsf.sqlite which does have a patch.

 spack stage hsf.sqlite
==> Error: No such patch file for package sqlite: /home/gartung/hep-spack/packages/sqlite/sqlite_b0.patch

If the hsf repo is removed then 
spack stage sqlite 
works as expected.
title: Spack complains of missing patch file when staging hsf sqlite package
